course_description: A course for students interested in continuing their study of ballroom and social dance. This course concentrates on intermediate level step patterns of the following dances: Foxtrot, Waltz, American Tango, East Coast Swing, Rumba, and Cha-Cha, and introduces the Mambo, Salsa and free-style Hip-Hop.
schedule_location: TTh 4pm-5:15pm in Woodruff PE Center Mult
